data.title: Business and non-profit plans
data.meta_description: Poll Everywhere offers the most flexible Audience Response System on the market. Plans include free text message voting and polling.
data.text:
For those looking to get started with Poll Everywhere For those needing more poll responses and email support For those wanting poll and activity insights with reporting For small teams who need customized poll branding For teams or organizations that need Enterprise-grade features

1 additional user included. Add more users at $125 per month

1 additional user included. Add more users at $499 per year

Get a plan custom designed for your organizational needs

Create unlimited questions

Ask as many questions as you want! Each poll can be cleared and reused with a different audience. Polls can be grouped into an unlimited number of slide decks or web surveys.

Create unlimited questions

Ask as many questions as you want! Each poll can be cleared and reused with a different audience. Polls can be grouped into an unlimited number of slide decks or web surveys. Everything in Present, plus: Everything in Engage, plus: Everything in Teams, plus:

25 max audience size

Audience size (or responses per poll) is the number of responses each single poll can receive. This means all customers can engage audiences of up to this number at a time. It also means they can allow smaller audiences to respond more than once, creating opportunity for more interesting word clouds and richer Q&A sessions.

700 max audience size

Audience size (or responses per poll) is the number of responses each single poll can receive. This means all customers can engage audiences of up to this number at a time. It also means they can allow smaller audiences to respond more than once, creating opportunity for more interesting word clouds and richer Q&A sessions.

Create reports and access archived poll responses

Select which questions you'd like to summarize to view a high level report of responses. You can export any report as a spreadsheet or print it as a PDF.

Phone and email support during business hours

Support is available Monday through Friday from 8 AM to 8 PM Eastern Time for all phone and email requests. Our support team answers 95% of phone calls during business hours, and usually answers emails within one business day, often faster.

Custom max audience size

Audience size (or responses per activity) is the number of responses each single activity can receive. This means all customers can engage audiences of up to this number at a time. It also means they can allow smaller audiences to respond more than once, creating opportunity for more interesting word clouds and richer Q&A sessions.

Support center, FAQ, and Webinar tutorials

Extensive guides, video tutorials, and a community support forum are provided to help you get the most out of Poll Everywhere.

Email support during business hours

Support is available Monday through Friday from 8 AM to 8 PM Eastern Time for all email requests. Our Customer Support Team usually answers emails within one business day, often faster.

Restrict responses to registered participants

This allows you to control exactly who can respond to polls. You can optionally require participants to register their name and email address before responding.

Choose your own username/response URL

Get a custom username and URL. This feature allows you to customize the name for your personal response page and SMS responses. You can use your name, company's name, the name of the event, or anything you like, as long as it's not in use by someone else.

Dedicated success manager plus priority support

You will work with a dedicated success manager to make sure your needs are met.

Moderate incoming responses

Manually approve each message to prevent inappropriate, off-topic, duplicate, or irrelevant responses from showing up on your screens.

Custom branding on polls and response page

Add your logo, fine-tune colors, style activity in both the big display and the audienceâ€™s devices.

Manage presenter Teams and share activities

Set up for success with tools that help you control presenter access.

Attendance management and reporting

Automatically capture attendance for in-person classes and presentations using geolocation services, and measure engagement through attendance and participation scoring.

Pinned questions during presentations

Create an open-ended Q&A activity, then pin it in Settings. Your Pinned Q&A activity will remain active in the background, letting participants give feedback at any time during your presentation.

SOC 2 Type 2 audited security

Poll Everywhere is certified by the AICPA as a SOC 2 Type 2 level SaaS application. You can trust that we are storing, processing and managing your data securely and to SOC standards.
